director.name: Juliana San José de la Fuente Juliana San José de la Fuente

introduction: A man travels in a space from which he has no way out in time. That space is a route, and a gas station at the side of it. A series of crimes will take place in that gas station, that will involve the main character. He will try to run, but he will find himself locked in the same situation over and over again. No matter which direction he takes, he will find the same gas station, and will be victim of a strange accident in the route, over and over.
